\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 97804}

\subsection*{Nabilone Body Buzz}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{kozmio}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 2 mg &  & Nabilone & \\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 240.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
Recenetly been prescribed nabilone (Cesamet) 1mg by my family doctor without any con-ning her and not the the reasons its typicaly [prescribed for. But my experience on this medcation is when taken at a 2mg dose, I get the extreme PASTIES, the munchies and a great body buzz that last a while, although the mental buzz is slighlty less that if I smoked the original thc off the plant. Mixing it with Clonazepam (Klonipin 2mg or Rivotril) just puts me at a super relaxed state where sleep can becoming uncontrollable\ldots
